sql-select.name: GetTestDataForTicket98
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SELECT CONVERT([DATETIME], N'2013-10-01T10:30:00') AS [ReportDateTime] ,10.0 AS [DataValue]
UNION ALL
SELECT CONVERT([DATETIME], N'2013-10-01T11:30:00') AS [ReportDateTime] ,15.0 AS [DataValue]
UNION ALL
SELECT CONVERT([DATETIME], N'2013-10-01T12:30:00') AS [ReportDateTime] ,20.0 AS [DataValue]
UNION ALL
SELECT CONVERT([DATETIME], N'2013-10-01T13:30:00') AS [ReportDateTime] ,5.00 AS [DataValue]
;
